name: Redgear A-15 Wired Gaming Mouse with RGB, Semi-Honeycomb Design and Upto 6400 dpi for Windows PC Gamers(White)
short_description: About this item Compatibility: Redgear A15 is compatible with PCs, laptops, notebooks and other devices with a similar input. Multi Programmable Buttons: The Redgear A15 is designed with multi programmable buttons and also has durable and semi honeycomb design for a better grip. Upto 6400 DPI: With Redgear A15 you can experience a DPI change of upto 6400 RGB Lighting: A15 comes equipped with customizable RGB mode Other Features: It comes with a gaming grade sensor for quick movements and reflexes. It also has extra durable switches and enhanced build quality to increase the durability of the mouse.  See more product details
top_positive_review: Back in my college days I have used Abyssus, Death Adder, Kana and Rival. Now after 10 years I have recently started playing Valorant and wanted a decent mouse for a few regular casual sessions. I was planning on something economically priced and choose this one after my recently bought HP M270 gave away. Size is decent and on having a claw grip hand doesn't brush against the pad. Clicks are crisp and RGB lighting through the honeycomb pores is quite eye catching. Mouse wheel could have been better. There are 5 sensitivity setting and each has designated color code assigned to it. Overall a good mouse at that price range.
top_critical_review: First of all, for the price, this mouse is very good value for money. But, it falls short when it comes to the purpose it's advertised for - gaming. I think it is due to the low polling rate but the mouse feels a bit 'sluggish' (for the lack of a better term) when engaging in fast paced activities. There is also problems with click registration (mostly the right click and it's very rare, not a regular issue but thought I'd mention). Pros 1) The price. As I said, for this price, the mouse is indeed VFM. The features (which I'll talk more about below) you get, and the overall build quality of the product far exceeds it's price range. 2) The build quality. As mentioned above, the build quality in my opinion is one of the best aspects of this mouse. It feels solid in your hand. It's pretty sizeable, and as someone with big hands, it really feels comfortable either with a palming or a claw grip method. 3) The USB cable. I have seen conflicting reviews on here but at least the piece I received has a braided USB cable. 4) The RGB. The software provides you with tons of RGB customisation. It also has different lights for different DPI levels so you know what setting you have changed to in the heat of action. 5) The extra buttons. They're there, they work, and they feel nice. Well placed and easy to use. 6) Ergonomic. The shape makes it very comfortable for long periods of usage. Cons 1) Gaming performance. Despite the high DPI levels it can go to, the polling rate holds it back when it comes to fast paced, precision gaming. I played a bunch of Doom Eternal with it and there were click registration and mouse skipping issues that popped up from time to time. If you're really into FPSes, especially online ones, this product will not meet your needs. It's a shame because otherwise, this mouse is great. 2) The scroll wheel. Flimsy and difficult to click. Overall, this would be a nice addition to a gaming rig if you don't play a lot of FPSes and want a RGB mouse to compliment your other RGB stuff. It would also be wonderful as an everyday mouse given its good build quality and comfortable shape. Unfortunately, it's not good to actually game with. I'm torn because on one hand, I like the majority of the things about this mouse but I just can't overlook the performance. I also have the Redgear Shadow Blade mechanical gaming keyboard and that thing is so good; I wish they had brought the performance of that over to this. It would've been an absolute killer.

name: Corsair Scimitar RGB Elite, MOBA/MMO Gaming Mouse, Black, Backlit RGB LED, 18000 DPI, Optical (CH-9304211-AP)
short_description: About this item Loaded with 17 fully programmable buttons, ideal for performing frequent actions and executing complex macros in MMOs and MOBAs. Patented Key Slider control system lets you reposition the 12 side buttons to comfortably fit your grip. hardware macro playback: three predefined profiles include actions common for MMO gaming as well as General purpose keyboard shortcuts. Custom, gaming Grade 16000 DPI Optical sensor: ultra-accurate and high-speed tracking Engine. Surface calibration tuning Utility: optimizes sensor precision and responsiveness for your playing surface. Equipped with a custom PixArt PMW3391 native 18, 000 DPI optical sensor, adjustable in 1 DPI resolution steps, for highly accurate and customizable tracking. The SCIMITAR RGB ELITE’s 50 million click-rated Omron switches, durably constructed scroll wheel, and braided cable ensure that it stands up to the wear-and-tear of extended gaming. Sculpted to comfortably fit the contours of your palm, regardless of hand size or grip style, with a right-side finger rest for added support.  See more product details

name: Portronics Toad 23 Wireless Optical Mouse with 2.4GHz, USB Nano Dongle, Optical Orientation, Click Wheel, Adjustable DPI(White)

No software or driver installation needed. The mouse automatically connects to your computer system. It is ready to go when you are. [CARRY IT ANYWHERE, EVERYWHERE] - Portronics Toad 23 Wireless Optical Mouse is the perfect accessory for those who travel for work, executives who give presentations, or anyone who wants greater control and freedom. With its compact design, it easily fits in pockets. [ERGONOMIC DESIGN] - Designed to keep either hand comfortable. With the click wheel, Toad 23 becomes easier to use with a third click button at your disposal. [HIGH-SPEED OPTICAL MOUSE] - The 2.4 GHz operating speed of this wireless mouse sends quick signals to the device. With the button to adjust DPI resolution, now adjust your mouse sensitivity as per your requirement. [30 LAKHS+ CLICKS] - Once you buy Toad 23 Wireless Optical Mouse, you don’t need to worry about its durability. With a life of over 30 lakhs clicks, this wireless mouse is highly durable and delivers optimal work quality to the users.  See more product details

name: Portronics Toad 30 Wireless Mouse with 2.4 GHz Connectivity, USB Receiver, 6 Buttons, Adjustable DPI, Silicon Grip & Ergonomic Design for PC, Laptop, Mac (White)
short_description: About this item Wireless Freedom: The Portronics Toad 30 is a wireless mouse that connects effortlessly to your computer with a 2.4 GHz wireless USB receiver. Enjoy a hassle-free experience with a generous 10-meter working range. Smart Button Design: The wireless mouse has 6 smart buttons, including left and right-click buttons, DPI adjustment, scroll wheel, and next/previous buttons for easy navigation. Comfort & Durability: With its ergonomic silicone grip, the Toad 30 ensures comfortable control during extended use. It has an impressive 30 lakh+ click life, guaranteeing long-lasting, reliable performance. Customizable Optical Tracking: Take control of your cursor with adjustable optical sensitivity up to 1600 DPI (dots per inch). Whether you need precise movements or speedy scrolling, this mouse has the right setting for you. Universal Compatibility: This mouse is your perfect tech companion, whether you use Windows or MacOS. It's designed to work seamlessly with both operating systems, making it versatile for all your devices.  See more product details
product_description: Introducing the Portronics Toad 30 wireless mouse, the ultimate choice for seamless productivity. Experience a strong and stable 2.4 GHz wireless connection with a generous 10m range, compatible with both Windows and macOS systems. Its ergonomic design, featuring a soft silicone grip, ensures enhanced comfort during long hours of use, while the 30 lakh+ silent click life guarantees longevity. Tailor your experience with adjustable DPI levels, reaching up to 1600, and navigate effortlessly with 6 convenient buttons. Plus, enjoy extended battery life with auto energy-saving technology and 2 AAA batteries.
top_positive_review: Amazing product , worth every single rupee.
top_critical_review: Writing this review after couple of months usage. I can't bear this brand anymore. The mouse stopped working after couple of months. Their return policy within warranty will take weeks to get a replacement. After 3, 4 weeks I received a replacement and that was defective again. The customer service doesn't reply to your queries and don't know the status of your returns as well.very low quality product. Go for hp, Logitech etc and avoid this. My friends also had similar experience and this is a common issue with protonics

name: Portronics Toad 101 Wired Optical Mouse with 1200 DPI, Plug & Play, Hi-Optical Tracking, 1.25M Cable Length, 30 Million Click Life(Black)
short_description: About this item [1200 DPI FOR SUBLIME RESPONSE] : Perhaps one of the most important aspects of an optical wired mouse is its DPI. It is the standard used to measure the mouse sensitivity for ‘Dots Per linear Inch’, it’s simple the higher the DPI higher the performance while gaming and photo editing. Portronic Toad 101 clocks in at 1200 DPI making it ideal for minimal gaming, photo editing and top-notch work on desktop/laptop. [USB CONNECTIVITY] : It is compatible with USB A Type which is the most commonly used port on systems found in homes and offices. Just plug the wired optical mouse into a USB port for an impeccable scrolling experience. [1.25 M CABLE FOR COMFORT] : Decently long 1.35 m cable so that you can easily connect the optical wired mouse to your PC/Laptop and work and work efficiently from an ideal distance. [OPTICAL SENSOR WITH QUICK TRACK] : The optical track sensor of the Toad 101 wired mouse has the best reaction designed to work on most surfaces. It works equally good on your lap as it would on a flat top stand. Even the minor flick initiates timely responses. [ALL WORK & PLAY] : With decent DPI and hi-performance Toad 101 wired mouse is crafted for working and casual gaming. Connect with friends over work or a casual online gaming session with Toad 101.  See more product details
product_description: Working for long hours often causes discomfort in your hands, now your palms can work comfortably while working. The Portronics Toad 101 wired optical mouse is made with a design to accommodate your hands. This causes your palm to rest comfortably so that you can work for long hours. Just plug and play and connect to your system super fast with USB 2.0. The wired mouse comes with 1.25 meter cable so that you can sit at a comfortable distance from your system. With a click lie over 3 million that mouse is dependable. With a no tangle cord you can keep the optical mouse easily in your bag.
top_positive_review: I have no hesitation in saying that this brand makes very good and durable products, and the best part is that despite the low price, they do not compromise on the quality of their products. Keep it up.. very good and smooth mouse, working perfectly..! Especially I like that Clicking sound that is giving me Nostalgic feeling..! Worth it. !!
top_critical_review: Build quality is so so ......you can get better design and build quality in this same price ....

name: Dell MS116 Wired Optical Mouse, 1000DPI, LED Tracking, Scrolling Wheel, Plug and Play
short_description: About this item Movement Detection: Optical, Resolution : 1000dpi;Cable Length : 1.8 meter, Interface Type : USB Colour : Black, Weight : 413 Grams Great Aesthetics, Usage ideal for office, education sectors, designing, basic gaming etc Comfortable for use in longer periods with performance; Warranty : 3 Year Hardware Platform: Pc  See more product details
product_description: The Dell Optical Mouse – MS116 features optical LED tracking and  wired connectivity, providing a stellar performance day after day.  Improve your productivity at the office or at home – the Dell Optical  Mouse will help to keep you on task with accurate 1,000 DPI optical  tracking.

Designed for comfortable use over extended periods of  time, the Dell Optical Mouse is your desktop partner. Shaped and sized  to fit the contours of your hand with two buttons and a scroll wheel,  the Dell Optical Mouse makes it easy to navigate through on-screen  projects.
The Dell Optical Mouse is compatible with almost any system that has a  USB port. Use one mouse in the office and keep another at home.
Simply plug the Dell Optical Mouse into any available USB port and get to work – it's that easy.
With a contemporary design aesthetic, the Dell Optical Mouse–MS116 seamlessly fits into any desktop environment.
At Home or in the Office
The Dell Optical Mouse is the perfect choice for either home or  office use – wherever reliability, comfort and convenience are  objectives.
top_positive_review: Perfect mouse, light weight, long cable, comfortable to use. You can't get a better deal in this price range, best in price. Very versatile in use, it's scroll wheel is clickable also which helps in scrolling fast. Grip wise also good, no problem at all.
top_critical_review: This is my after one year review and I am very disappointed with this mouse I use this mouse as daily day to day tasks but after one year left click sometimes perform as right click. It feels so much annoying and frustrating. This is not good for 3 years.
